Tag hierarchy

Source: R/c2d.gen.R
data_tags.Rd

A tibble reflecting the complete referendum tags hierarchy.

data_tags

Format

A tibble.

See also

tags hierarchize_tags infer_tags

Examples

c2d::data_tags
#> # A tibble: 136 × 3
#>    tag_tier_1         tag_tier_2        tag_tier_3

#>  6 state organisation institutions      government, administration         
#>  7 state organisation institutions      parliament                         
#>  8 state organisation institutions      courts                             
#>  9 state organisation institutions      national bank                      
#> 10 state organisation citizens' rights  citizens' initiatives              
#> # … with 126 more rows
